result.purpose: Test the InboundEmailsController for handling inbound emails from Mandrill.
functions: test verifying existence of Mandrill inbound route
test receiving an inbound email from Mandrill
test rejecting a forged inbound email from Mandrill
test raising when Mandrill API key is nil
test raising when Mandrill API key is blank
side_effects: Creates and deletes inbound email records in the database
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive API key if not properly managed
